discontinuedMessage: This product has been discontinued. It will still be purchasable while stocks last but will not be restocked after this point.
name: HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS - Pkt/2
description:
HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS

Main Features:

  • Great as a heel or elbow pad
  • Soft convoluted inside surface with ventilation holes near the heel, helps air to circulate around the foot
  • Large enough to protect the ankles & both sides of the feet
  • Simple and quick to fit with a Hook & Loop Tape strap
  • One size to fit small to large feet
  • Low cost and long life
  • Wash and reuse

This product is used in many hospitals and nursing homes to help prevent decubitus ulcers. Various departments may use this product:

  • Geriatric
  • Stroke
  • Orthopaedic
  • Post-Operative
  • Intensive Care
  • HIV
  • Diabetic
  • Podiatry
  • Hospice Care
  • Heart Failure
  • Multiple Sclerosis
  • Burns Unit

The slippery outer cover allows the foot to move around slightly and the product stays on the foot.

Another feature is some extra foam under the Hook & Loop Tape strap to try to stop the strap from touching the top of the foot. On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

*Image is the sample of the product.

discontinuedMessage: This product has been discontinued. It will still be purchasable while stocks last but will not be restocked after this point.

name: HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS - Pkt/2
description:
HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS

Main Features:

  • Great as a heel or elbow pad
  • Soft convoluted inside surface with ventilation holes near the heel, helps air to circulate around the foot
  • Large enough to protect the ankles & both sides of the feet
  • Simple and quick to fit with a Hook & Loop Tape strap
  • One size to fit small to large feet
  • Low cost and long life
  • Wash and reuse

This product is used in many hospitals and nursing homes to help prevent decubitus ulcers. Various departments may use this product:

  • Geriatric
  • Stroke
  • Orthopaedic
  • Post-Operative
  • Intensive Care
  • HIV
  • Diabetic
  • Podiatry
  • Hospice Care
  • Heart Failure
  • Multiple Sclerosis
  • Burns Unit

The slippery outer cover allows the foot to move around slightly and the product stays on the foot.

Another feature is some extra foam under the Hook & Loop Tape strap to try to stop the strap from touching the top of the foot. On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

*Image is the sample of the product.

name: ResQsheet Rescue Sheet Bariatric Size (450kg) - 210x99cm
description:
The ResQsheet- Bariatric Size is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient.

The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features & Benefits:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • 2 long pulling straps at each end, sewn with extra loops down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • 3 Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete

Specifications:

  • Size: 210 x 99cm
  • Machine washable
  • Safety Working Load (SWL): 450kg
  • Size: Bariatric
  • UOM: Each
  • Image is sample of product

name: ResQsheet Vinyl Rescue Sheet (300kg) - 191x88cm
description:
ResQsheet Rescue Sheet for emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients.

The ResQsheet is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. Daily bed making is as normal. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient. The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. This saves the staff from having to carry them. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After an emergency evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • Long pulling straps, sewn half way down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Rubber on the sides to help prevent the mattress slipping when getting into and out of bed
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete
  • Slides well on vinyl floors.

Special Features:
Special Press Studs (Patent Applied For) are on the Pulling Straps and the Cross Straps. By doing the Press Studs up, the webbing will be kept in place to help prevent the Pulling Straps falling off the ends of the bed.

There have been occasions when these straps have been tangled on attachments to the bed and have delayed a fast evacuation. The Cross Straps also have Press Studs to stop the straps falling between the bed side rail and the bed base.

Specifications:

  • Size: 191cm x 88cm
  • Safe Working Load (SWL): 300kg
  • Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air dry in the shade, or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.
  • UOM: each
  • Image is sample of products

After evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features & Benefits:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • 2 long pulling straps at each end, sewn with extra loops down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • 3 Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete

Specifications:

  • Size: 210 x 99cm
  • Machine washable
  • Safety Working Load (SWL): 450kg
  • Size: Bariatric
  • UOM: Each
  • Image is sample of product

name: HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS - Pkt/2
description:
HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS

Main Features:

  • Great as a heel or elbow pad
  • Soft convoluted inside surface with ventilation holes near the heel, helps air to circulate around the foot
  • Large enough to protect the ankles & both sides of the feet
  • Simple and quick to fit with a Hook & Loop Tape strap
  • One size to fit small to large feet
  • Low cost and long life
  • Wash and reuse

This product is used in many hospitals and nursing homes to help prevent decubitus ulcers. Various departments may use this product:

  • Geriatric
  • Stroke
  • Orthopaedic
  • Post-Operative
  • Intensive Care
  • HIV
  • Diabetic
  • Podiatry
  • Hospice Care
  • Heart Failure
  • Multiple Sclerosis
  • Burns Unit

The slippery outer cover allows the foot to move around slightly and the product stays on the foot.

Another feature is some extra foam under the Hook & Loop Tape strap to try to stop the strap from touching the top of the foot. On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

*Image is the sample of the product.

name: SMOKING PROTECTOR
description:
SMOKING PROTECTOR

  • The Smoking Protector is designed to help prevent burns if a person drops a cigarette while smoking.
  • Standard size is 81cm (L) x 52cm (W) and does not cover the arms of the chair.

To Use

Wear the Smoking Protector like an apron. Fasten the strap behind the neck, then tie the side tape around the person’s back. Tie with a bow that will be easy to undo.

name: ResQsheet Vinyl Rescue Sheet (300kg) - 191x88cm
description:
ResQsheet Rescue Sheet for emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients.

The ResQsheet is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. Daily bed making is as normal. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient. The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. This saves the staff from having to carry them. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After an emergency evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • Long pulling straps, sewn half way down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Rubber on the sides to help prevent the mattress slipping when getting into and out of bed
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete
  • Slides well on vinyl floors.

Special Features:
Special Press Studs (Patent Applied For) are on the Pulling Straps and the Cross Straps. By doing the Press Studs up, the webbing will be kept in place to help prevent the Pulling Straps falling off the ends of the bed.

There have been occasions when these straps have been tangled on attachments to the bed and have delayed a fast evacuation. The Cross Straps also have Press Studs to stop the straps falling between the bed side rail and the bed base.

Specifications:

  • Size: 191cm x 88cm
  • Safe Working Load (SWL): 300kg
  • Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air dry in the shade, or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.
  • UOM: each
  • Image is sample of products

discontinuedMessage: This product has been discontinued. It will still be purchasable while stocks last but will not be restocked after this point.

name: HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS - Pkt/2
description:
HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS

Main Features:

  • Great as a heel or elbow pad
  • Soft convoluted inside surface with ventilation holes near the heel, helps air to circulate around the foot
  • Large enough to protect the ankles & both sides of the feet
  • Simple and quick to fit with a Hook & Loop Tape strap
  • One size to fit small to large feet
  • Low cost and long life
  • Wash and reuse

This product is used in many hospitals and nursing homes to help prevent decubitus ulcers. Various departments may use this product:

  • Geriatric
  • Stroke
  • Orthopaedic
  • Post-Operative
  • Intensive Care
  • HIV
  • Diabetic
  • Podiatry
  • Hospice Care
  • Heart Failure
  • Multiple Sclerosis
  • Burns Unit

The slippery outer cover allows the foot to move around slightly and the product stays on the foot.

Another feature is some extra foam under the Hook & Loop Tape strap to try to stop the strap from touching the top of the foot. On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

*Image is the sample of the product.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

name: Slide Sheet Slippery Pink 1.5mx2m
description:
This Pink Bed Slide Sheet is an essential manual handling product. The slippery material can be used in a number of ways to help move patients in bed.

The idea is to make the turning or moving a patient up the bed, easier for the Carer with less disturbance to the patient as they eliminate log rolling.

The pink material, which this product is made from, is not breathable and has some noise when in use. 

 

How to use this product:

Fold the sheet in half and roll it under a patient, similar to fitting a draw sheet.

When moving the patient, gather up the loose end of the top part of the sheet and use body weight to turn the patient.

Do not use excessive movements with your arms.

We generally recommend using the Bed Slide Sheets folded in half.

 

Colour: Pink

UOM: 1.5m x 2m

Image is sample of product

name: ResQsheet Vinyl Rescue Sheet (300kg) - 191x88cm
description:
ResQsheet Rescue Sheet for emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients.

The ResQsheet is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. Daily bed making is as normal. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient. The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. This saves the staff from having to carry them. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After an emergency evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • Long pulling straps, sewn half way down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Rubber on the sides to help prevent the mattress slipping when getting into and out of bed
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete
  • Slides well on vinyl floors.

Special Features:
Special Press Studs (Patent Applied For) are on the Pulling Straps and the Cross Straps. By doing the Press Studs up, the webbing will be kept in place to help prevent the Pulling Straps falling off the ends of the bed.

There have been occasions when these straps have been tangled on attachments to the bed and have delayed a fast evacuation. The Cross Straps also have Press Studs to stop the straps falling between the bed side rail and the bed base.

Specifications:

  • Size: 191cm x 88cm
  • Safe Working Load (SWL): 300kg
  • Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air dry in the shade, or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.
  • UOM: each
  • Image is sample of products

discontinuedMessage: This product has been discontinued. It will still be purchasable while stocks last but will not be restocked after this point.

name: ResQsheet Vinyl Rescue Sheet (300kg) - 191x88cm
description:
ResQsheet Rescue Sheet for emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients.

The ResQsheet is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. Daily bed making is as normal. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient. The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. This saves the staff from having to carry them. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After an emergency evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • Long pulling straps, sewn half way down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Rubber on the sides to help prevent the mattress slipping when getting into and out of bed
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete
  • Slides well on vinyl floors.

Special Features:
Special Press Studs (Patent Applied For) are on the Pulling Straps and the Cross Straps. By doing the Press Studs up, the webbing will be kept in place to help prevent the Pulling Straps falling off the ends of the bed.

There have been occasions when these straps have been tangled on attachments to the bed and have delayed a fast evacuation. The Cross Straps also have Press Studs to stop the straps falling between the bed side rail and the bed base.

Specifications:

  • Size: 191cm x 88cm
  • Safe Working Load (SWL): 300kg
  • Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air dry in the shade, or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.
  • UOM: each
  • Image is sample of products

name: Handi Lift Walk Belt - Medium
description:
The Handi Lift Walk Belt is a popular transfer belt for patient handling. You can use it for transferring people, and when walking with people who need help.

Two Carers normally work together when using the Handi Lift Walk Belt. If necessary one Carer with training can work alone as long as this is safe.

Specifications:

  • 10cm wide double Hook & Loop Tape belt is very supportive
  • All four of the webbing handles are padded
  • Lining: Grey Miracle Grip

On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

*Image is the sample of the product.

name: ResQsheet Rescue Sheet Bariatric Size (450kg) - 210x99cm
description:
The ResQsheet- Bariatric Size is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient.

The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features & Benefits:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • 2 long pulling straps at each end, sewn with extra loops down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • 3 Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete

Specifications:

  • Size: 210 x 99cm
  • Machine washable
  • Safety Working Load (SWL): 450kg
  • Size: Bariatric
  • UOM: Each
  • Image is sample of product

discontinuedMessage: This product has been discontinued. It will still be purchasable while stocks last but will not be restocked after this point.
name: ResQsheet Vinyl Rescue Sheet (300kg) - 191x88cm
description:
ResQsheet Rescue Sheet for emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients.

The ResQsheet is kept in position under the mattress with strong elastic corner straps. Daily bed making is as normal. If there is an emergency, then the webbing straps are removed from their pockets and quickly done up around the mattress and the patient. The head and foot end pulling straps are also taken out from under the mattress. The mattress and the patient are then lowered onto the floor for very fast and safe evacuation. This saves the staff from having to carry them. The patient is protected by their mattress and they can be easily taken down stairs to safety.

After an emergency evacuation, the patient can be left still cocooned in the ResQsheet which may be helpful with patients who are liable to wander. The Cross Straps are sewn across the full width of the ResQsheet to provide extra security in case the strong nylon material should tear on a rough surface, i.e. driveways, roads, etc.

Features:

  • For emergency evacuation of non-ambulant patients
  • Long pulling straps, sewn half way down the length to allow for more rescuers
  • Rubber on the sides to help prevent the mattress slipping when getting into and out of bed
  • Press studs & pockets for the Cross Straps to help contain the straps and prevent them getting caught in side rails
  • Plastic buckles – safer than metal buckles when detached under strain, and will not damage a washing machine
  • Cross Straps sewn all the way across the material for extra strength – especially good for sliding on rough tarmac/bitumen/concrete
  • Slides well on vinyl floors.

Special Features:
Special Press Studs (Patent Applied For) are on the Pulling Straps and the Cross Straps. By doing the Press Studs up, the webbing will be kept in place to help prevent the Pulling Straps falling off the ends of the bed.

There have been occasions when these straps have been tangled on attachments to the bed and have delayed a fast evacuation. The Cross Straps also have Press Studs to stop the straps falling between the bed side rail and the bed base.

Specifications:

  • Size: 191cm x 88cm
  • Safe Working Load (SWL): 300kg
  • Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air dry in the shade, or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.
  • UOM: each
  • Image is sample of products

discontinuedMessage: This product has been discontinued. It will still be purchasable while stocks last but will not be restocked after this point.

Another feature is some extra foam under the Hook & Loop Tape strap to try to stop the strap from touching the top of the foot. On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

name: Handi Lift Walk Belt - Large
description:
The Handi Lift Walk Belt is a popular transfer belt for patient handling. You can use it for transferring people, and when walking with people who need help.

Two Carers normally work together when using the Handi Lift Walk Belt. If necessary one Carer with training can work alone as long as this is safe.

Specifications:

  • 10cm wide double Hook & Loop Tape belt is very supportive
  • All four of the webbing handles are padded
  • Lining: Grey Miracle Grip
  • Colour: Green
  • Size: Large (Waist: 90cm-117cm)
  • UOM: Each

name: Handi Lift Walk Belt - Large
description:
The Handi Lift Walk Belt is a popular transfer belt for patient handling. You can use it for transferring people, and when walking with people who need help.

Two Carers normally work together when using the Handi Lift Walk Belt. If necessary one Carer with training can work alone as long as this is safe.

Specifications:

  • 10cm wide double Hook & Loop Tape belt is very supportive
  • All four of the webbing handles are padded
  • Lining: Grey Miracle Grip
  • Colour: Green
  • Size: Large (Waist: 90cm-117cm)
  • UOM: Each

name: Slide Sheet Slippery Pink 1.5mx2m
description:
This Pink Bed Slide Sheet is an essential manual handling product. The slippery material can be used in a number of ways to help move patients in bed.

The idea is to make the turning or moving a patient up the bed, easier for the Carer with less disturbance to the patient as they eliminate log rolling.

The pink material, which this product is made from, is not breathable and has some noise when in use. 

 

How to use this product:

Fold the sheet in half and roll it under a patient, similar to fitting a draw sheet.

When moving the patient, gather up the loose end of the top part of the sheet and use body weight to turn the patient.

Do not use excessive movements with your arms.

We generally recommend using the Bed Slide Sheets folded in half.

 

Colour: Pink

UOM: 1.5m x 2m

Image is sample of product

name: HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS - Pkt/2
description:
HEEL/ELBOW FOAM PADS

Main Features:

  • Great as a heel or elbow pad
  • Soft convoluted inside surface with ventilation holes near the heel, helps air to circulate around the foot
  • Large enough to protect the ankles & both sides of the feet
  • Simple and quick to fit with a Hook & Loop Tape strap
  • One size to fit small to large feet
  • Low cost and long life
  • Wash and reuse

This product is used in many hospitals and nursing homes to help prevent decubitus ulcers. Various departments may use this product:

  • Geriatric
  • Stroke
  • Orthopaedic
  • Post-Operative
  • Intensive Care
  • HIV
  • Diabetic
  • Podiatry
  • Hospice Care
  • Heart Failure
  • Multiple Sclerosis
  • Burns Unit

The slippery outer cover allows the foot to move around slightly and the product stays on the foot.

Another feature is some extra foam under the Hook & Loop Tape strap to try to stop the strap from touching the top of the foot. On many feet, the foam can overlap before doing up the Hook & Loop Tape, or if the patient has swollen feet and the Hook & Loop Tape is near the top of the foot, some disposable wadding can be placed under the Hook & Loop Tape.

Cleaning: Wash up to 80°C (176°F). Air or tumble dry on a cool setting, ensuring the drum is cool. Ensure the product is dry before using or storing.

Warning: This product is not designed to be worn while walking.

*Image is the sample of the product.
